title: Flashback.Repack-z10yded
description:
Flashback.Repack-z10yded

Year: 2013
Publication Type: RePack 
Tablet: {enclosing} RELOADED
Version: 1.1.1378.0
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Sound language:  RUS,  ENG

Description: 

Flashback - reissue of the classic adventure game Flashback, 
which was published over 20 years ago and landed in the Guinness 
Book of Records as the best-selling French game in history. 
The game tells the story of an agent of the Galactic Bureau of 
Investigation Conrad Hart, who is trying to stop the invasion 
of Earth by aliens disguised as humans. Players will once 
again play the role of Conrad, an employee of the Galactic 
Bureau of Investigation. He was kidnapped and his memory 
erased, and now the hero is in great danger. The game features 
an advanced animation, and when you create stop-motion 
technique was used manual image processing.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP  (SP3), Windows Vista  (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1) 
Processor: Intel  Core  2 Duo E4400 2.0 GHz or AMD  Athlon  64 X2 Dual Core 4200 + 
Memory: 1 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce 7600 GS or ATI  Radeon HD 2600XT 256MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Hard disk space: 2.5 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features  

Removed localization besides Russian and English / no recoded 
Game Version 1.1.1378.0 
Installation time ~ 2 minutes 
Repack by z10yded
